            <div role="navigation" aria-label="primary">
                <oc-component href="//registry.chegg.com/chegg-header/2.69.1?type=study&translucent=0&noDistractions=0&hideSearch=0&noSearch=0&searchOnScroll=0&searchProfile=federated-chegg-study-auto&registry=%2F%2Fregistry.chegg.com%2F&searchRendered=1&staticBaseUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chegg.com%2F&cheggBaseUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chegg.com%2F&nonSticky=0&forceDesktop=0&loadedOnChegg=1&hideMobileTutors=1&kitKatSearch=1&hybridKitKat=0&heroSmall=0&math=1&writing=1&studyPackNavLink=1&kitKatRelative=1&learnOnDedicatedNav=1&mobileOCSearch=1&mathSubjects=1&mathGraphing=1" data-hash="f17012c7b18fc51f1c17e7ecc040fc4fbc823d6b" data-name="chegg-header" data-rendered="true" data-version="2.69.1"><script>
    window.oc = window.oc || {};
    oc.cmd = oc.cmd || [];
    oc.cmd.push(function(oc){
        var oldUnderscore = window._;
        var oldBackbone = window.Backbone;
        var isLoaded = false;

        // Versions of libs
        if (window.jQuery && (jQuery.fn.jquery === '1.7.1')){
            window.cheggJQuery = jQuery;
        }
        if (window._ && (_.VERSION === '1.4.3')){
            window.cheggUnderscore = _;
        }
        if (window.Backbone && (Backbone.VERSION === '1.0.0')){
            window.cheggBackbone = Backbone;
        }

        var globalPack = {
            url: "//components.cheggcdn.com/components/chegg-header/2.69.1/dist/js/global.lite.pack.js"
        };
        if ( !!true ) {
            globalPack.global = 'C';
        }

        oc.requireSeries( [ {
            global: 'Eggshell',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/eggshell-minified.js'
        }, {
            global: 'cheggJQuery',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/jquery-1.7.1-ns.js'
        }, {
            global: 'cheggUnderscore',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/chegg-underscore-min.js'
        }, {
            global: 'cheggBackbone',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/chegg-backbone-min.js'
        }, globalPack, {
            global: 'Chegg_Header_Define',
            url: "//components.cheggcdn.com/components/chegg-header/2.69.1/dist/js/component.js"
        }], initComponent );


        function initComponent(){
            if (!isLoaded
                && window.Eggshell
                && window.cheggJQuery
                && window.cheggUnderscore
                && window.cheggBackbone
                && window.C
                && window.Chegg_Header_Define){

                isLoaded = true;
                // Define component
                window.Chegg_Header_Define(
                    window.cheggJQuery,
                    window.cheggJQuery,
                    window.cheggUnderscore,
                    window.cheggBackbone,
                    window.Eggshell
                );

                C.global = C.global || {};
                if(!C.global.coversBaseUrl){
                    C('global.coversBaseUrl', "//cs.cheggcdn.com/");
                }
                if(!C.global.tutorsCdnUrl){
                    C('global.tutorsCdnUrl', "//d3uhujs20ekyp2.cloudfront.net/tutors/");
                }
                if(!C.global.cheggBaseUrl){
                    C('global.cheggBaseUrl', "https://www.chegg.com/");
                }
                if(!C.global.cheggSiteSecureUrl){
                    C('global.cheggSiteSecureUrl', "https:"+"//www.chegg.com/");
                }
                if(!C.global.cheggSiteUrl){
                    C('global.cheggSiteUrl', "http:"+"//www.chegg.com/");
                }
                if(!C.global.liveSiteUrl){
                    C('global.liveSiteUrl', "https://www.chegg.com/");
                }
                if((!C.global.userEmail && "") ||
                    (!C.global.userFirstName && "") ||
                      (!C.global.userLastName && "") ||
                        (!C.global.userAvatar && "")){
                    C('global.userEmail', "");
                    C('global.userFirstName', "");
                    C('global.userLastName', "");
                    C('global.userAvatar', "");
                    C('global.loggedIn', "false" === "true");
                }
                //Prevent call to get user if we already have the information
                if(!C.global.csrfToken || (C.global.userEmail && C.global.loggedIn)){
                    C.utility.updateCsrfToken(ready, C.global.cheggSiteSecureUrl);
                }else{
                    ready();
                }
            }
        }

        function ready(){
            var activeExperiments = C.utility.getActiveExperiments();
            /** 
             *  CSP Onboarding phase 2 params
            */
            var CSPOnboardingPhase2Params = {};
            try{
                CSPOnboardingPhase2Params = JSON.parse('{"isCSPLiveOnboarding":false,"showStudyPackButton":false,"showPreOnBoarding":false,"showAutoMaticPreOnboarding":false,"showAutoMaticMegaMenu":false,"showMegaMenu":false,"preOnBoardingStep":null,"cspIterationFrequency":null,"isResponsiveSearch":true}');
            }catch(error){
                console.error('CHEGG HEADER: Error in JSON.parse for CSPOnboardingPhase2Params for payload: ', payload, 'where error is: ', error);
            };

            var structureMenuItems = '';
            var type = decodeURI('study');
            var userType = decodeURI('false');
            var searchProfile = decodeURI('federated-chegg-study-auto');
            var noConstellation = decodeURI('') === '1';
            var noSearch = decodeURI('false') === 'true';
            var searchOnScroll = decodeURI('') === 'hidden ';
            var userMenuItems = JSON.parse('{}');
            var settings = JSON.parse('{"globalNav":false,"hideDistractions":"","type":"study","userType":false,"subtype":"","year":2021,"renderDesktop":true,"renderMobile":true,"regSource":""}');
            var signInSignUpNoRedirect =  decodeURI('false') === 'true';
            var signOutNoRedirect = decodeURI('false') === 'true';
            var studyPackNavLink = decodeURI('true') === 'true';
            var hideOCSearch = decodeURI('false') === 'true';

            window.globalChggHeader = Eggshell.create('C.global.cheggheader')
                .trigger('set type', type)
                .trigger('set userType', userType)
                .trigger('set no search', noSearch)
                .trigger('set search on scroll', searchOnScroll)
                .trigger('disable constellation', noConstellation)
                .trigger('set search type', searchProfile)
                .trigger('set structure menu items', structureMenuItems)
                .trigger('set user menu items', userMenuItems)
                .trigger('set menu settings', settings)
                .trigger('set_sign_in_sign_up_no_redirect', signInSignUpNoRedirect)
                .trigger('set_sign_out_no_redirect', signOutNoRedirect)
                .trigger('set_csp_onboarding_phase2_params', CSPOnboardingPhase2Params)
                .trigger('set_study_pack_nav_link', studyPackNavLink)
                .trigger('set_hide_OC_search', hideOCSearch)
                .trigger('render');

            Eggshell.immuneToDestroyAll(window.globalChggHeader);
            oc.events.fire('globalHeaderCreated');
        }

    });
</script>

            <script>
            //If OC search doesn't load this is a fallback redirect    
            function doSafetySearchRedirect() {
                var inputValue = document.getElementById('responsive-search-placeholder-input').value;
                window.location.href = '/search/'+encodeURIComponent(inputValue)+'/federated';
                return false;
            }
            </script>
            <form class="search-form-placeholder" onsubmit="return doSafetySearchRedirect();">
                <label class="visible-to-screen-readers-only" for="search-suggester">Find solutions for your homework or get textbooks</label>
                <input id="responsive-search-placeholder-input" class="automation-search-input-placeholder search-input" type="search" name="search-suggester" autosave="chegg-search" placeholder="Find solutions for your homework or get textbooks" autocomplete="off" aria-label="Search chegg content" value="">

    <div class="chg-footer"  >
            <oc-component href="//registry.chegg.com/chegg-footer/2.19.0?customCheggDomain=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chegg.com%2F&id=demo&data=%5Bobject%20Object%5D" data-hash="81701b9ba9e9e89bad9ff29b0f6f0b59a1b49c0c" data-name="chegg-footer" data-rendered="true" data-version="2.19.0"><script>
    window.oc = window.oc || {};
    oc.cmd = oc.cmd || [];
    oc.cmd.push( function ( oc ) {
        var isLoaded = false;
        var blockedLoading = false;
        var OCcallback = ready;
        var tutorC = null;

        // Versions of libs
        if ( window.jQuery && (jQuery.fn.jquery === '1.7.1') ) {
            window.cheggJQuery = jQuery;
        }
        if ( window._ && (_.VERSION === '1.4.3') ) {
            window.cheggUnderscore = _;
        }
        if ( window.Backbone && (Backbone.VERSION === '1.0.0') ) {
            window.cheggBackbone = Backbone;
        }

        var initComponent = function initComponent() {
            if ( !isLoaded
                    && !blockedLoading
                    && window.Eggshell
                    && window.cheggJQuery
                    && window.cheggUnderscore
                    && window.cheggBackbone
                    && window.C
                    && window.CheggFooter_Define ) {

                isLoaded = true;

                // Define component
                window.CheggFooter_Define(
                        window.cheggJQuery,
                        window.cheggJQuery,
                        window.cheggUnderscore,
                        window.cheggBackbone,
                        window.Eggshell
                );

                C.global = C.global || {};

                if ( !C.global.cheggBaseUrl ) {
                    C( 'global.cheggBaseUrl', "//www.chegg.com/" );
                }
                if ( !C.global.cheggSiteSecureUrl ) {
                    C( 'global.cheggSiteSecureUrl', "https:" + "//www.chegg.com/" );
                }
                //Prevent call to get user if we already have the information
                if ( !C.global.csrfToken && !!C.utility) {
                    C.utility.updateCsrfToken( OCcallback, C.global.cheggSiteSecureUrl );
                } else {
                    OCcallback();
                }
            }

        };

        function ready() {
            // Init components
            window.cheggJQuery( document ).ready( function () {
                var $el = window.cheggJQuery( '#demo.C-chegg-footer' );
                var component = Eggshell.create( 'C.chegg.footer', {
                    el: $el,
                    id: 'demo'
                } );
                oc.events.fire( 'CheggFooter_Init', {
                    id: 'demo',
                    component: component
                } );
            } );
        }

        // check if we've already loaded specific the OC
        function isComponentLoading( component ) {
            if ( typeof component == 'undefined' ) {
                component = 'chegg-header';
            }
            return !!oc.renderedComponents.hasOwnProperty( component );
        }

        // basically, this code we loaded only for labelUpdate, that why we check it here
        function isGlobalValueLoaded() {
            return typeof C !== 'undefined' && typeof C.global !== 'undefined' && typeof C.global.labelUpdate !== 'undefined';
        }

        // We need temporary to replace the global value 'C' on the tutors page and then return.
        function replaceBackCValue() {
            if ( tutorC ) {
                for ( var variable in tutorC.global ) {
                    C( 'global.' + variable, tutorC.global[ variable ] );
                }
            }
            ready();
        }
        // the value 'C' should be a function
        function replaceCValue() {
            if ( typeof C !== 'undefined' && typeof C !== 'function' ) {
                tutorC = Object.assign( {}, C );
                OCcallback = replaceBackCValue;
                delete( C );
            }
        }

        // the condition was added
        // for avoiding to load the same library 'global.lite.pack.js'
        // this library could be also loaded at the chegg-header component
        var globalPack;
        if ( !isGlobalValueLoaded() && isComponentLoading( 'chegg-header' ) === false ) {
            replaceCValue();
            globalPack = {
                url: "//components.cheggcdn.com/components/chegg-footer/2.19.0/dist/js/global.lite.pack.js",
                global: 'C'
            };
        } else {
            blockedLoading = true;
            oc.events.on('globalHeaderCreated', function () {
                blockedLoading = false;
                initComponent();
            });
        }

        var requiresList = [ {
            global: 'Eggshell',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/eggshell-minified.js'
        }, {
            global: 'cheggJQuery',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/jquery-1.7.1-ns.js'
        }, {
            global: 'cheggUnderscore',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/chegg-underscore-min.js'
        }, {
            global: 'cheggBackbone',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/chegg-backbone-min.js'
        } ];

        if ( !!globalPack ) {
            Array.prototype.push.apply( requiresList, [ globalPack ] );
        }
        Array.prototype.push.apply( requiresList, [ {
            global: 'CheggFooter_Define',
            url: "//components.cheggcdn.com/components/chegg-footer/2.19.0/dist/js/component.js"
        } ]);

        oc.requireSeries( requiresList, initComponent );

    } );

</script>

                <oc-component href="//registry.chegg.com/chegg-header/2.69.1?type=study&translucent=0&noDistractions=0&hideSearch=0&noSearch=0&searchOnScroll=0&searchProfile=federated-chegg-study-auto&registry=%2F%2Fregistry.chegg.com%2F&searchRendered=1&staticBaseUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chegg.com%2F&cheggBaseUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chegg.com%2F&nonSticky=0&forceDesktop=0&loadedOnChegg=1&hideMobileTutors=1&kitKatSearch=1&hybridKitKat=0&heroSmall=0&math=1&writing=1&studyPackNavLink=1&kitKatRelative=1&learnOnDedicatedNav=1&mobileOCSearch=1&mathSubjects=1&mathGraphing=1" data-hash="f17012c7b18fc51f1c17e7ecc040fc4fbc823d6b" data-name="chegg-header" data-rendered="true" data-version="2.69.1"><script>
    window.oc = window.oc || {};
    oc.cmd = oc.cmd || [];
    oc.cmd.push(function(oc){
        var oldUnderscore = window._;
        var oldBackbone = window.Backbone;
        var isLoaded = false;

        // Versions of libs
        if (window.jQuery && (jQuery.fn.jquery === '1.7.1')){
            window.cheggJQuery = jQuery;
        }
        if (window._ && (_.VERSION === '1.4.3')){
            window.cheggUnderscore = _;
        }
        if (window.Backbone && (Backbone.VERSION === '1.0.0')){
            window.cheggBackbone = Backbone;
        }

        var globalPack = {
            url: "//components.cheggcdn.com/components/chegg-header/2.69.1/dist/js/global.lite.pack.js"
        };
        if ( !!true ) {
            globalPack.global = 'C';
        }

        oc.requireSeries( [ {
            global: 'Eggshell',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/eggshell-minified.js'
        }, {
            global: 'cheggJQuery',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/jquery-1.7.1-ns.js'
        }, {
            global: 'cheggUnderscore',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/chegg-underscore-min.js'
        }, {
            global: 'cheggBackbone',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/chegg-backbone-min.js'
        }, globalPack, {
            global: 'Chegg_Header_Define',
            url: "//components.cheggcdn.com/components/chegg-header/2.69.1/dist/js/component.js"
        }], initComponent );


        function initComponent(){
            if (!isLoaded
                && window.Eggshell
                && window.cheggJQuery
                && window.cheggUnderscore
                && window.cheggBackbone
                && window.C
                && window.Chegg_Header_Define){

                isLoaded = true;
                // Define component
                window.Chegg_Header_Define(
                    window.cheggJQuery,
                    window.cheggJQuery,
                    window.cheggUnderscore,
                    window.cheggBackbone,
                    window.Eggshell
                );

                C.global = C.global || {};
                if(!C.global.coversBaseUrl){
                    C('global.coversBaseUrl', "//cs.cheggcdn.com/");
                }
                if(!C.global.tutorsCdnUrl){
                    C('global.tutorsCdnUrl', "//d3uhujs20ekyp2.cloudfront.net/tutors/");
                }
                if(!C.global.cheggBaseUrl){
                    C('global.cheggBaseUrl', "https://www.chegg.com/");
                }
                if(!C.global.cheggSiteSecureUrl){
                    C('global.cheggSiteSecureUrl', "https:"+"//www.chegg.com/");
                }
                if(!C.global.cheggSiteUrl){
                    C('global.cheggSiteUrl', "http:"+"//www.chegg.com/");
                }
                if(!C.global.liveSiteUrl){
                    C('global.liveSiteUrl', "https://www.chegg.com/");
                }
                if((!C.global.userEmail && "") ||
                    (!C.global.userFirstName && "") ||
                      (!C.global.userLastName && "") ||
                        (!C.global.userAvatar && "")){
                    C('global.userEmail', "");
                    C('global.userFirstName', "");
                    C('global.userLastName', "");
                    C('global.userAvatar', "");
                    C('global.loggedIn', "false" === "true");
                }
                //Prevent call to get user if we already have the information
                if(!C.global.csrfToken || (C.global.userEmail && C.global.loggedIn)){
                    C.utility.updateCsrfToken(ready, C.global.cheggSiteSecureUrl);
                }else{
                    ready();
                }
            }
        }

        function ready(){
            var activeExperiments = C.utility.getActiveExperiments();
            /** 
             *  CSP Onboarding phase 2 params
            */
            var CSPOnboardingPhase2Params = {};
            try{
                CSPOnboardingPhase2Params = JSON.parse('{"isCSPLiveOnboarding":false,"showStudyPackButton":false,"showPreOnBoarding":false,"showAutoMaticPreOnboarding":false,"showAutoMaticMegaMenu":false,"showMegaMenu":false,"preOnBoardingStep":null,"cspIterationFrequency":null,"isResponsiveSearch":true}');
            }catch(error){
                console.error('CHEGG HEADER: Error in JSON.parse for CSPOnboardingPhase2Params for payload: ', payload, 'where error is: ', error);
            };

            var structureMenuItems = '';
            var type = decodeURI('study');
            var userType = decodeURI('false');
            var searchProfile = decodeURI('federated-chegg-study-auto');
            var noConstellation = decodeURI('') === '1';
            var noSearch = decodeURI('false') === 'true';
            var searchOnScroll = decodeURI('') === 'hidden ';
            var userMenuItems = JSON.parse('{}');
            var settings = JSON.parse('{"globalNav":false,"hideDistractions":"","type":"study","userType":false,"subtype":"","year":2021,"renderDesktop":true,"renderMobile":true,"regSource":""}');
            var signInSignUpNoRedirect =  decodeURI('false') === 'true';
            var signOutNoRedirect = decodeURI('false') === 'true';
            var studyPackNavLink = decodeURI('true') === 'true';
            var hideOCSearch = decodeURI('false') === 'true';

            window.globalChggHeader = Eggshell.create('C.global.cheggheader')
                .trigger('set type', type)
                .trigger('set userType', userType)
                .trigger('set no search', noSearch)
                .trigger('set search on scroll', searchOnScroll)
                .trigger('disable constellation', noConstellation)
                .trigger('set search type', searchProfile)
                .trigger('set structure menu items', structureMenuItems)
                .trigger('set user menu items', userMenuItems)
                .trigger('set menu settings', settings)
                .trigger('set_sign_in_sign_up_no_redirect', signInSignUpNoRedirect)
                .trigger('set_sign_out_no_redirect', signOutNoRedirect)
                .trigger('set_csp_onboarding_phase2_params', CSPOnboardingPhase2Params)
                .trigger('set_study_pack_nav_link', studyPackNavLink)
                .trigger('set_hide_OC_search', hideOCSearch)
                .trigger('render');

            Eggshell.immuneToDestroyAll(window.globalChggHeader);
            oc.events.fire('globalHeaderCreated');
        }

    });
</script>

            <script>
            //If OC search doesn't load this is a fallback redirect    
            function doSafetySearchRedirect() {
                var inputValue = document.getElementById('responsive-search-placeholder-input').value;
                window.location.href = '/search/'+encodeURIComponent(inputValue)+'/federated';
                return false;
            }
            </script>
            <form class="search-form-placeholder" onsubmit="return doSafetySearchRedirect();">

    <div class="chg-footer"  >
            <oc-component href="//registry.chegg.com/chegg-footer/2.19.0?customCheggDomain=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chegg.com%2F&id=demo&data=%5Bobject%20Object%5D" data-hash="81701b9ba9e9e89bad9ff29b0f6f0b59a1b49c0c" data-name="chegg-footer" data-rendered="true" data-version="2.19.0"><script>
    window.oc = window.oc || {};
    oc.cmd = oc.cmd || [];
    oc.cmd.push( function ( oc ) {
        var isLoaded = false;
        var blockedLoading = false;
        var OCcallback = ready;
        var tutorC = null;

        // Versions of libs
        if ( window.jQuery && (jQuery.fn.jquery === '1.7.1') ) {
            window.cheggJQuery = jQuery;
        }
        if ( window._ && (_.VERSION === '1.4.3') ) {
            window.cheggUnderscore = _;
        }
        if ( window.Backbone && (Backbone.VERSION === '1.0.0') ) {
            window.cheggBackbone = Backbone;
        }

        var initComponent = function initComponent() {
            if ( !isLoaded
                    && !blockedLoading
                    && window.Eggshell
                    && window.cheggJQuery
                    && window.cheggUnderscore
                    && window.cheggBackbone
                    && window.C
                    && window.CheggFooter_Define ) {

                isLoaded = true;

                // Define component
                window.CheggFooter_Define(
                        window.cheggJQuery,
                        window.cheggJQuery,
                        window.cheggUnderscore,
                        window.cheggBackbone,
                        window.Eggshell
                );

                C.global = C.global || {};

                if ( !C.global.cheggBaseUrl ) {
                    C( 'global.cheggBaseUrl', "//www.chegg.com/" );
                }
                if ( !C.global.cheggSiteSecureUrl ) {
                    C( 'global.cheggSiteSecureUrl', "https:" + "//www.chegg.com/" );
                }
                //Prevent call to get user if we already have the information
                if ( !C.global.csrfToken && !!C.utility) {
                    C.utility.updateCsrfToken( OCcallback, C.global.cheggSiteSecureUrl );
                } else {
                    OCcallback();
                }
            }

        };

        function ready() {
            // Init components
            window.cheggJQuery( document ).ready( function () {
                var $el = window.cheggJQuery( '#demo.C-chegg-footer' );
                var component = Eggshell.create( 'C.chegg.footer', {
                    el: $el,
                    id: 'demo'
                } );
                oc.events.fire( 'CheggFooter_Init', {
                    id: 'demo',
                    component: component
                } );
            } );
        }

        // check if we've already loaded specific the OC
        function isComponentLoading( component ) {
            if ( typeof component == 'undefined' ) {
                component = 'chegg-header';
            }
            return !!oc.renderedComponents.hasOwnProperty( component );
        }

        // basically, this code we loaded only for labelUpdate, that why we check it here
        function isGlobalValueLoaded() {
            return typeof C !== 'undefined' && typeof C.global !== 'undefined' && typeof C.global.labelUpdate !== 'undefined';
        }

        // We need temporary to replace the global value 'C' on the tutors page and then return.
        function replaceBackCValue() {
            if ( tutorC ) {
                for ( var variable in tutorC.global ) {
                    C( 'global.' + variable, tutorC.global[ variable ] );
                }
            }
            ready();
        }
        // the value 'C' should be a function
        function replaceCValue() {
            if ( typeof C !== 'undefined' && typeof C !== 'function' ) {
                tutorC = Object.assign( {}, C );
                OCcallback = replaceBackCValue;
                delete( C );
            }
        }

        // the condition was added
        // for avoiding to load the same library 'global.lite.pack.js'
        // this library could be also loaded at the chegg-header component
        var globalPack;
        if ( !isGlobalValueLoaded() && isComponentLoading( 'chegg-header' ) === false ) {
            replaceCValue();
            globalPack = {
                url: "//components.cheggcdn.com/components/chegg-footer/2.19.0/dist/js/global.lite.pack.js",
                global: 'C'
            };
        } else {
            blockedLoading = true;
            oc.events.on('globalHeaderCreated', function () {
                blockedLoading = false;
                initComponent();
            });
        }

        var requiresList = [ {
            global: 'Eggshell',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/eggshell-minified.js'
        }, {
            global: 'cheggJQuery',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/jquery-1.7.1-ns.js'
        }, {
            global: 'cheggUnderscore',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/chegg-underscore-min.js'
        }, {
            global: 'cheggBackbone',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/chegg-backbone-min.js'
        } ];

        if ( !!globalPack ) {
            Array.prototype.push.apply( requiresList, [ globalPack ] );
        }
        Array.prototype.push.apply( requiresList, [ {
            global: 'CheggFooter_Define',
            url: "//components.cheggcdn.com/components/chegg-footer/2.19.0/dist/js/component.js"
        } ]);

        oc.requireSeries( requiresList, initComponent );

    } );

</script>

            <div role="navigation" aria-label="primary">
                <oc-component href="//registry.chegg.com/chegg-header/2.69.1?type=study&translucent=0&noDistractions=0&hideSearch=0&noSearch=0&searchOnScroll=0&searchProfile=federated-chegg-study-auto&registry=%2F%2Fregistry.chegg.com%2F&searchRendered=1&staticBaseUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chegg.com%2F&cheggBaseUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chegg.com%2F&nonSticky=0&forceDesktop=0&loadedOnChegg=1&hideMobileTutors=1&kitKatSearch=1&hybridKitKat=0&heroSmall=0&math=1&writing=1&studyPackNavLink=1&kitKatRelative=1&learnOnDedicatedNav=1&mobileOCSearch=1&mathSubjects=1&mathGraphing=1" data-hash="f17012c7b18fc51f1c17e7ecc040fc4fbc823d6b" data-name="chegg-header" data-rendered="true" data-version="2.69.1"><script>
    window.oc = window.oc || {};
    oc.cmd = oc.cmd || [];
    oc.cmd.push(function(oc){
        var oldUnderscore = window._;
        var oldBackbone = window.Backbone;
        var isLoaded = false;

        // Versions of libs
        if (window.jQuery && (jQuery.fn.jquery === '1.7.1')){
            window.cheggJQuery = jQuery;
        }
        if (window._ && (_.VERSION === '1.4.3')){
            window.cheggUnderscore = _;
        }
        if (window.Backbone && (Backbone.VERSION === '1.0.0')){
            window.cheggBackbone = Backbone;
        }

        var globalPack = {
            url: "//components.cheggcdn.com/components/chegg-header/2.69.1/dist/js/global.lite.pack.js"
        };
        if ( !!true ) {
            globalPack.global = 'C';
        }

        oc.requireSeries( [ {
            global: 'Eggshell',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/eggshell-minified.js'
        }, {
            global: 'cheggJQuery',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/jquery-1.7.1-ns.js'
        }, {
            global: 'cheggUnderscore',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/chegg-underscore-min.js'
        }, {
            global: 'cheggBackbone',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/chegg-backbone-min.js'
        }, globalPack, {
            global: 'Chegg_Header_Define',
            url: "//components.cheggcdn.com/components/chegg-header/2.69.1/dist/js/component.js"
        }], initComponent );


        function initComponent(){
            if (!isLoaded
                && window.Eggshell
                && window.cheggJQuery
                && window.cheggUnderscore
                && window.cheggBackbone
                && window.C
                && window.Chegg_Header_Define){

                isLoaded = true;
                // Define component
                window.Chegg_Header_Define(
                    window.cheggJQuery,
                    window.cheggJQuery,
                    window.cheggUnderscore,
                    window.cheggBackbone,
                    window.Eggshell
                );

                C.global = C.global || {};
                if(!C.global.coversBaseUrl){
                    C('global.coversBaseUrl', "//cs.cheggcdn.com/");
                }
                if(!C.global.tutorsCdnUrl){
                    C('global.tutorsCdnUrl', "//d3uhujs20ekyp2.cloudfront.net/tutors/");
                }
                if(!C.global.cheggBaseUrl){
                    C('global.cheggBaseUrl', "https://www.chegg.com/");
                }
                if(!C.global.cheggSiteSecureUrl){
                    C('global.cheggSiteSecureUrl', "https:"+"//www.chegg.com/");
                }
                if(!C.global.cheggSiteUrl){
                    C('global.cheggSiteUrl', "http:"+"//www.chegg.com/");
                }
                if(!C.global.liveSiteUrl){
                    C('global.liveSiteUrl', "https://www.chegg.com/");
                }
                if((!C.global.userEmail && "") ||
                    (!C.global.userFirstName && "") ||
                      (!C.global.userLastName && "") ||
                        (!C.global.userAvatar && "")){
                    C('global.userEmail', "");
                    C('global.userFirstName', "");
                    C('global.userLastName', "");
                    C('global.userAvatar', "");
                    C('global.loggedIn', "false" === "true");
                }
                //Prevent call to get user if we already have the information
                if(!C.global.csrfToken || (C.global.userEmail && C.global.loggedIn)){
                    C.utility.updateCsrfToken(ready, C.global.cheggSiteSecureUrl);
                }else{
                    ready();
                }
            }
        }

        function ready(){
            var activeExperiments = C.utility.getActiveExperiments();
            /** 
             *  CSP Onboarding phase 2 params
            */
            var CSPOnboardingPhase2Params = {};
            try{
                CSPOnboardingPhase2Params = JSON.parse('{"isCSPLiveOnboarding":false,"showStudyPackButton":false,"showPreOnBoarding":false,"showAutoMaticPreOnboarding":false,"showAutoMaticMegaMenu":false,"showMegaMenu":false,"preOnBoardingStep":null,"cspIterationFrequency":null,"isResponsiveSearch":true}');
            }catch(error){
                console.error('CHEGG HEADER: Error in JSON.parse for CSPOnboardingPhase2Params for payload: ', payload, 'where error is: ', error);
            };

            var structureMenuItems = '';
            var type = decodeURI('study');
            var userType = decodeURI('false');
            var searchProfile = decodeURI('federated-chegg-study-auto');
            var noConstellation = decodeURI('') === '1';
            var noSearch = decodeURI('false') === 'true';
            var searchOnScroll = decodeURI('') === 'hidden ';
            var userMenuItems = JSON.parse('{}');
            var settings = JSON.parse('{"globalNav":false,"hideDistractions":"","type":"study","userType":false,"subtype":"","year":2021,"renderDesktop":true,"renderMobile":true,"regSource":""}');
            var signInSignUpNoRedirect =  decodeURI('false') === 'true';
            var signOutNoRedirect = decodeURI('false') === 'true';
            var studyPackNavLink = decodeURI('true') === 'true';
            var hideOCSearch = decodeURI('false') === 'true';

            window.globalChggHeader = Eggshell.create('C.global.cheggheader')
                .trigger('set type', type)
                .trigger('set userType', userType)
                .trigger('set no search', noSearch)
                .trigger('set search on scroll', searchOnScroll)
                .trigger('disable constellation', noConstellation)
                .trigger('set search type', searchProfile)
                .trigger('set structure menu items', structureMenuItems)
                .trigger('set user menu items', userMenuItems)
                .trigger('set menu settings', settings)
                .trigger('set_sign_in_sign_up_no_redirect', signInSignUpNoRedirect)
                .trigger('set_sign_out_no_redirect', signOutNoRedirect)
                .trigger('set_csp_onboarding_phase2_params', CSPOnboardingPhase2Params)
                .trigger('set_study_pack_nav_link', studyPackNavLink)
                .trigger('set_hide_OC_search', hideOCSearch)
                .trigger('render');

            Eggshell.immuneToDestroyAll(window.globalChggHeader);
            oc.events.fire('globalHeaderCreated');
        }

    });
</script>

            <script>
            //If OC search doesn't load this is a fallback redirect    
            function doSafetySearchRedirect() {
                var inputValue = document.getElementById('responsive-search-placeholder-input').value;
                window.location.href = '/search/'+encodeURIComponent(inputValue)+'/federated';
                return false;
            }
            </script>
            <form class="search-form-placeholder" onsubmit="return doSafetySearchRedirect();">
                <label class="visible-to-screen-readers-only" for="search-suggester">Find solutions for your homework or get textbooks</label>
                <input id="responsive-search-placeholder-input" class="automation-search-input-placeholder search-input" type="search" name="search-suggester" autosave="chegg-search" placeholder="Find solutions for your homework or get textbooks" autocomplete="off" aria-label="Search chegg content" value="">
                <button class="automation-search-submit-button-placeholder" type="submit" data-type="button" aria-label="Submit">
                    <span class="icon-chegg-search"></span>
                    <span class="">Search</span>
                </button>
            </form>

            <oc-component href="//registry.chegg.com/chegg-footer/2.19.0?customCheggDomain=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chegg.com%2F&id=demo&data=%5Bobject%20Object%5D" data-hash="81701b9ba9e9e89bad9ff29b0f6f0b59a1b49c0c" data-name="chegg-footer" data-rendered="true" data-version="2.19.0"><script>
    window.oc = window.oc || {};
    oc.cmd = oc.cmd || [];
    oc.cmd.push( function ( oc ) {
        var isLoaded = false;
        var blockedLoading = false;
        var OCcallback = ready;
        var tutorC = null;

        // Versions of libs
        if ( window.jQuery && (jQuery.fn.jquery === '1.7.1') ) {
            window.cheggJQuery = jQuery;
        }
        if ( window._ && (_.VERSION === '1.4.3') ) {
            window.cheggUnderscore = _;
        }
        if ( window.Backbone && (Backbone.VERSION === '1.0.0') ) {
            window.cheggBackbone = Backbone;
        }

        var initComponent = function initComponent() {
            if ( !isLoaded
                    && !blockedLoading
                    && window.Eggshell
                    && window.cheggJQuery
                    && window.cheggUnderscore
                    && window.cheggBackbone
                    && window.C
                    && window.CheggFooter_Define ) {

                isLoaded = true;

                // Define component
                window.CheggFooter_Define(
                        window.cheggJQuery,
                        window.cheggJQuery,
                        window.cheggUnderscore,
                        window.cheggBackbone,
                        window.Eggshell
                );

                C.global = C.global || {};

                if ( !C.global.cheggBaseUrl ) {
                    C( 'global.cheggBaseUrl', "//www.chegg.com/" );
                }
                if ( !C.global.cheggSiteSecureUrl ) {
                    C( 'global.cheggSiteSecureUrl', "https:" + "//www.chegg.com/" );
                }
                //Prevent call to get user if we already have the information
                if ( !C.global.csrfToken && !!C.utility) {
                    C.utility.updateCsrfToken( OCcallback, C.global.cheggSiteSecureUrl );
                } else {
                    OCcallback();
                }
            }

        };

        function ready() {
            // Init components
            window.cheggJQuery( document ).ready( function () {
                var $el = window.cheggJQuery( '#demo.C-chegg-footer' );
                var component = Eggshell.create( 'C.chegg.footer', {
                    el: $el,
                    id: 'demo'
                } );
                oc.events.fire( 'CheggFooter_Init', {
                    id: 'demo',
                    component: component
                } );
            } );
        }

        // check if we've already loaded specific the OC
        function isComponentLoading( component ) {
            if ( typeof component == 'undefined' ) {
                component = 'chegg-header';
            }
            return !!oc.renderedComponents.hasOwnProperty( component );
        }

        // basically, this code we loaded only for labelUpdate, that why we check it here
        function isGlobalValueLoaded() {
            return typeof C !== 'undefined' && typeof C.global !== 'undefined' && typeof C.global.labelUpdate !== 'undefined';
        }

        // We need temporary to replace the global value 'C' on the tutors page and then return.
        function replaceBackCValue() {
            if ( tutorC ) {
                for ( var variable in tutorC.global ) {
                    C( 'global.' + variable, tutorC.global[ variable ] );
                }
            }
            ready();
        }
        // the value 'C' should be a function
        function replaceCValue() {
            if ( typeof C !== 'undefined' && typeof C !== 'function' ) {
                tutorC = Object.assign( {}, C );
                OCcallback = replaceBackCValue;
                delete( C );
            }
        }

        // the condition was added
        // for avoiding to load the same library 'global.lite.pack.js'
        // this library could be also loaded at the chegg-header component
        var globalPack;
        if ( !isGlobalValueLoaded() && isComponentLoading( 'chegg-header' ) === false ) {
            replaceCValue();
            globalPack = {
                url: "//components.cheggcdn.com/components/chegg-footer/2.19.0/dist/js/global.lite.pack.js",
                global: 'C'
            };
        } else {
            blockedLoading = true;
            oc.events.on('globalHeaderCreated', function () {
                blockedLoading = false;
                initComponent();
            });
        }

        var requiresList = [ {
            global: 'Eggshell',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/eggshell-minified.js'
        }, {
            global: 'cheggJQuery',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/jquery-1.7.1-ns.js'
        }, {
            global: 'cheggUnderscore',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/chegg-underscore-min.js'
        }, {
            global: 'cheggBackbone',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/chegg-backbone-min.js'
        } ];

        if ( !!globalPack ) {
            Array.prototype.push.apply( requiresList, [ globalPack ] );
        }
        Array.prototype.push.apply( requiresList, [ {
            global: 'CheggFooter_Define',
            url: "//components.cheggcdn.com/components/chegg-footer/2.19.0/dist/js/component.js"
        } ]);

        oc.requireSeries( requiresList, initComponent );

    } );

</script>

            <div role="navigation" aria-label="primary">
                <oc-component href="//registry.chegg.com/chegg-header/2.69.1?type=study&translucent=0&noDistractions=0&hideSearch=0&noSearch=0&searchOnScroll=0&searchProfile=federated-chegg-study-auto&registry=%2F%2Fregistry.chegg.com%2F&searchRendered=1&staticBaseUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chegg.com%2F&cheggBaseUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chegg.com%2F&nonSticky=0&forceDesktop=0&loadedOnChegg=1&hideMobileTutors=1&kitKatSearch=1&hybridKitKat=0&heroSmall=0&math=1&writing=1&studyPackNavLink=1&kitKatRelative=1&learnOnDedicatedNav=1&mobileOCSearch=1&mathSubjects=1&mathGraphing=1" data-hash="f17012c7b18fc51f1c17e7ecc040fc4fbc823d6b" data-name="chegg-header" data-rendered="true" data-version="2.69.1"><script>
    window.oc = window.oc || {};
    oc.cmd = oc.cmd || [];
    oc.cmd.push(function(oc){
        var oldUnderscore = window._;
        var oldBackbone = window.Backbone;
        var isLoaded = false;

        // Versions of libs
        if (window.jQuery && (jQuery.fn.jquery === '1.7.1')){
            window.cheggJQuery = jQuery;
        }
        if (window._ && (_.VERSION === '1.4.3')){
            window.cheggUnderscore = _;
        }
        if (window.Backbone && (Backbone.VERSION === '1.0.0')){
            window.cheggBackbone = Backbone;
        }

        var globalPack = {
            url: "//components.cheggcdn.com/components/chegg-header/2.69.1/dist/js/global.lite.pack.js"
        };
        if ( !!true ) {
            globalPack.global = 'C';
        }

        oc.requireSeries( [ {
            global: 'Eggshell',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/eggshell-minified.js'
        }, {
            global: 'cheggJQuery',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/jquery-1.7.1-ns.js'
        }, {
            global: 'cheggUnderscore',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/chegg-underscore-min.js'
        }, {
            global: 'cheggBackbone',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/chegg-backbone-min.js'
        }, globalPack, {
            global: 'Chegg_Header_Define',
            url: "//components.cheggcdn.com/components/chegg-header/2.69.1/dist/js/component.js"
        }], initComponent );


        function initComponent(){
            if (!isLoaded
                && window.Eggshell
                && window.cheggJQuery
                && window.cheggUnderscore
                && window.cheggBackbone
                && window.C
                && window.Chegg_Header_Define){

                isLoaded = true;
                // Define component
                window.Chegg_Header_Define(
                    window.cheggJQuery,
                    window.cheggJQuery,
                    window.cheggUnderscore,
                    window.cheggBackbone,
                    window.Eggshell
                );

                C.global = C.global || {};
                if(!C.global.coversBaseUrl){
                    C('global.coversBaseUrl', "//cs.cheggcdn.com/");
                }
                if(!C.global.tutorsCdnUrl){
                    C('global.tutorsCdnUrl', "//d3uhujs20ekyp2.cloudfront.net/tutors/");
                }
                if(!C.global.cheggBaseUrl){
                    C('global.cheggBaseUrl', "https://www.chegg.com/");
                }
                if(!C.global.cheggSiteSecureUrl){
                    C('global.cheggSiteSecureUrl', "https:"+"//www.chegg.com/");
                }
                if(!C.global.cheggSiteUrl){
                    C('global.cheggSiteUrl', "http:"+"//www.chegg.com/");
                }
                if(!C.global.liveSiteUrl){
                    C('global.liveSiteUrl', "https://www.chegg.com/");
                }
                if((!C.global.userEmail && "") ||
                    (!C.global.userFirstName && "") ||
                      (!C.global.userLastName && "") ||
                        (!C.global.userAvatar && "")){
                    C('global.userEmail', "");
                    C('global.userFirstName', "");
                    C('global.userLastName', "");
                    C('global.userAvatar', "");
                    C('global.loggedIn', "false" === "true");
                }
                //Prevent call to get user if we already have the information
                if(!C.global.csrfToken || (C.global.userEmail && C.global.loggedIn)){
                    C.utility.updateCsrfToken(ready, C.global.cheggSiteSecureUrl);
                }else{
                    ready();
                }
            }
        }

        function ready(){
            var activeExperiments = C.utility.getActiveExperiments();
            /** 
             *  CSP Onboarding phase 2 params
            */
            var CSPOnboardingPhase2Params = {};
            try{
                CSPOnboardingPhase2Params = JSON.parse('{"isCSPLiveOnboarding":false,"showStudyPackButton":false,"showPreOnBoarding":false,"showAutoMaticPreOnboarding":false,"showAutoMaticMegaMenu":false,"showMegaMenu":false,"preOnBoardingStep":null,"cspIterationFrequency":null,"isResponsiveSearch":true}');
            }catch(error){
                console.error('CHEGG HEADER: Error in JSON.parse for CSPOnboardingPhase2Params for payload: ', payload, 'where error is: ', error);
            };

            var structureMenuItems = '';
            var type = decodeURI('study');
            var userType = decodeURI('false');
            var searchProfile = decodeURI('federated-chegg-study-auto');
            var noConstellation = decodeURI('') === '1';
            var noSearch = decodeURI('false') === 'true';
            var searchOnScroll = decodeURI('') === 'hidden ';
            var userMenuItems = JSON.parse('{}');
            var settings = JSON.parse('{"globalNav":false,"hideDistractions":"","type":"study","userType":false,"subtype":"","year":2021,"renderDesktop":true,"renderMobile":true,"regSource":""}');
            var signInSignUpNoRedirect =  decodeURI('false') === 'true';
            var signOutNoRedirect = decodeURI('false') === 'true';
            var studyPackNavLink = decodeURI('true') === 'true';
            var hideOCSearch = decodeURI('false') === 'true';

            window.globalChggHeader = Eggshell.create('C.global.cheggheader')
                .trigger('set type', type)
                .trigger('set userType', userType)
                .trigger('set no search', noSearch)
                .trigger('set search on scroll', searchOnScroll)
                .trigger('disable constellation', noConstellation)
                .trigger('set search type', searchProfile)
                .trigger('set structure menu items', structureMenuItems)
                .trigger('set user menu items', userMenuItems)
                .trigger('set menu settings', settings)
                .trigger('set_sign_in_sign_up_no_redirect', signInSignUpNoRedirect)
                .trigger('set_sign_out_no_redirect', signOutNoRedirect)
                .trigger('set_csp_onboarding_phase2_params', CSPOnboardingPhase2Params)
                .trigger('set_study_pack_nav_link', studyPackNavLink)
                .trigger('set_hide_OC_search', hideOCSearch)
                .trigger('render');

            Eggshell.immuneToDestroyAll(window.globalChggHeader);
            oc.events.fire('globalHeaderCreated');
        }

    });
</script>

        <div id="se-search-autosuggest">
            <script>
            //If OC search doesn't load this is a fallback redirect    
            function doSafetySearchRedirect() {
                var inputValue = document.getElementById('responsive-search-placeholder-input').value;
                window.location.href = '/search/'+encodeURIComponent(inputValue)+'/federated';
                return false;
            }
            </script>
            <form class="search-form-placeholder" onsubmit="return doSafetySearchRedirect();">
                <label class="visible-to-screen-readers-only" for="search-suggester">Find solutions for your homework or get textbooks</label>
                <input id="responsive-search-placeholder-input" class="automation-search-input-placeholder search-input" type="search" name="search-suggester" autosave="chegg-search" placeholder="Find solutions for your homework or get textbooks" autocomplete="off" aria-label="Search chegg content" value="">
                <button class="automation-search-submit-button-placeholder" type="submit" data-type="button" aria-label="Submit">
                    <span class="icon-chegg-search"></span>
                    <span class="">Search</span>
                </button>
            </form>
        </div>

    <div class="chg-footer"  >
            <oc-component href="//registry.chegg.com/chegg-footer/2.19.0?customCheggDomain=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chegg.com%2F&id=demo&data=%5Bobject%20Object%5D" data-hash="81701b9ba9e9e89bad9ff29b0f6f0b59a1b49c0c" data-name="chegg-footer" data-rendered="true" data-version="2.19.0"><script>
    window.oc = window.oc || {};
    oc.cmd = oc.cmd || [];
    oc.cmd.push( function ( oc ) {
        var isLoaded = false;
        var blockedLoading = false;
        var OCcallback = ready;
        var tutorC = null;

        // Versions of libs
        if ( window.jQuery && (jQuery.fn.jquery === '1.7.1') ) {
            window.cheggJQuery = jQuery;
        }
        if ( window._ && (_.VERSION === '1.4.3') ) {
            window.cheggUnderscore = _;
        }
        if ( window.Backbone && (Backbone.VERSION === '1.0.0') ) {
            window.cheggBackbone = Backbone;
        }

        var initComponent = function initComponent() {
            if ( !isLoaded
                    && !blockedLoading
                    && window.Eggshell
                    && window.cheggJQuery
                    && window.cheggUnderscore
                    && window.cheggBackbone
                    && window.C
                    && window.CheggFooter_Define ) {

                isLoaded = true;

                // Define component
                window.CheggFooter_Define(
                        window.cheggJQuery,
                        window.cheggJQuery,
                        window.cheggUnderscore,
                        window.cheggBackbone,
                        window.Eggshell
                );

                C.global = C.global || {};

                if ( !C.global.cheggBaseUrl ) {
                    C( 'global.cheggBaseUrl', "//www.chegg.com/" );
                }
                if ( !C.global.cheggSiteSecureUrl ) {
                    C( 'global.cheggSiteSecureUrl', "https:" + "//www.chegg.com/" );
                }
                //Prevent call to get user if we already have the information
                if ( !C.global.csrfToken && !!C.utility) {
                    C.utility.updateCsrfToken( OCcallback, C.global.cheggSiteSecureUrl );
                } else {
                    OCcallback();
                }
            }

        };

        function ready() {
            // Init components
            window.cheggJQuery( document ).ready( function () {
                var $el = window.cheggJQuery( '#demo.C-chegg-footer' );
                var component = Eggshell.create( 'C.chegg.footer', {
                    el: $el,
                    id: 'demo'
                } );
                oc.events.fire( 'CheggFooter_Init', {
                    id: 'demo',
                    component: component
                } );
            } );
        }

        // check if we've already loaded specific the OC
        function isComponentLoading( component ) {
            if ( typeof component == 'undefined' ) {
                component = 'chegg-header';
            }
            return !!oc.renderedComponents.hasOwnProperty( component );
        }

        // basically, this code we loaded only for labelUpdate, that why we check it here
        function isGlobalValueLoaded() {
            return typeof C !== 'undefined' && typeof C.global !== 'undefined' && typeof C.global.labelUpdate !== 'undefined';
        }

        // We need temporary to replace the global value 'C' on the tutors page and then return.
        function replaceBackCValue() {
            if ( tutorC ) {
                for ( var variable in tutorC.global ) {
                    C( 'global.' + variable, tutorC.global[ variable ] );
                }
            }
            ready();
        }
        // the value 'C' should be a function
        function replaceCValue() {
            if ( typeof C !== 'undefined' && typeof C !== 'function' ) {
                tutorC = Object.assign( {}, C );
                OCcallback = replaceBackCValue;
                delete( C );
            }
        }

        // the condition was added
        // for avoiding to load the same library 'global.lite.pack.js'
        // this library could be also loaded at the chegg-header component
        var globalPack;
        if ( !isGlobalValueLoaded() && isComponentLoading( 'chegg-header' ) === false ) {
            replaceCValue();
            globalPack = {
                url: "//components.cheggcdn.com/components/chegg-footer/2.19.0/dist/js/global.lite.pack.js",
                global: 'C'
            };
        } else {
            blockedLoading = true;
            oc.events.on('globalHeaderCreated', function () {
                blockedLoading = false;
                initComponent();
            });
        }

        var requiresList = [ {
            global: 'Eggshell',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/eggshell-minified.js'
        }, {
            global: 'cheggJQuery',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/jquery-1.7.1-ns.js'
        }, {
            global: 'cheggUnderscore',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/chegg-underscore-min.js'
        }, {
            global: 'cheggBackbone',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/chegg-backbone-min.js'
        } ];

        if ( !!globalPack ) {
            Array.prototype.push.apply( requiresList, [ globalPack ] );
        }
        Array.prototype.push.apply( requiresList, [ {
            global: 'CheggFooter_Define',
            url: "//components.cheggcdn.com/components/chegg-footer/2.19.0/dist/js/component.js"
        } ]);

        oc.requireSeries( requiresList, initComponent );

    } );

</script>

            C.adobeAnalytics.setData(window.digitalData);
        }

            <div role="navigation" aria-label="primary">
                <oc-component href="//registry.chegg.com/chegg-header/2.69.1?type=study&translucent=0&noDistractions=0&hideSearch=0&noSearch=0&searchOnScroll=0&searchProfile=federated-chegg-study-auto&registry=%2F%2Fregistry.chegg.com%2F&searchRendered=1&staticBaseUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chegg.com%2F&cheggBaseUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chegg.com%2F&nonSticky=0&forceDesktop=0&loadedOnChegg=1&hideMobileTutors=1&kitKatSearch=1&hybridKitKat=0&heroSmall=0&math=1&writing=1&studyPackNavLink=1&kitKatRelative=1&learnOnDedicatedNav=1&mobileOCSearch=1&mathSubjects=1&mathGraphing=1" data-hash="f17012c7b18fc51f1c17e7ecc040fc4fbc823d6b" data-name="chegg-header" data-rendered="true" data-version="2.69.1"><script>
    window.oc = window.oc || {};
    oc.cmd = oc.cmd || [];
    oc.cmd.push(function(oc){
        var oldUnderscore = window._;
        var oldBackbone = window.Backbone;
        var isLoaded = false;

        // Versions of libs
        if (window.jQuery && (jQuery.fn.jquery === '1.7.1')){
            window.cheggJQuery = jQuery;
        }
        if (window._ && (_.VERSION === '1.4.3')){
            window.cheggUnderscore = _;
        }
        if (window.Backbone && (Backbone.VERSION === '1.0.0')){
            window.cheggBackbone = Backbone;
        }

        var globalPack = {
            url: "//components.cheggcdn.com/components/chegg-header/2.69.1/dist/js/global.lite.pack.js"
        };
        if ( !!true ) {
            globalPack.global = 'C';
        }

        oc.requireSeries( [ {
            global: 'Eggshell',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/eggshell-minified.js'
        }, {
            global: 'cheggJQuery',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/jquery-1.7.1-ns.js'
        }, {
            global: 'cheggUnderscore',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/chegg-underscore-min.js'
        }, {
            global: 'cheggBackbone',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/chegg-backbone-min.js'
        }, globalPack, {
            global: 'Chegg_Header_Define',
            url: "//components.cheggcdn.com/components/chegg-header/2.69.1/dist/js/component.js"
        }], initComponent );


        function initComponent(){
            if (!isLoaded
                && window.Eggshell
                && window.cheggJQuery
                && window.cheggUnderscore
                && window.cheggBackbone
                && window.C
                && window.Chegg_Header_Define){

                isLoaded = true;
                // Define component
                window.Chegg_Header_Define(
                    window.cheggJQuery,
                    window.cheggJQuery,
                    window.cheggUnderscore,
                    window.cheggBackbone,
                    window.Eggshell
                );

                C.global = C.global || {};
                if(!C.global.coversBaseUrl){
                    C('global.coversBaseUrl', "//cs.cheggcdn.com/");
                }
                if(!C.global.tutorsCdnUrl){
                    C('global.tutorsCdnUrl', "//d3uhujs20ekyp2.cloudfront.net/tutors/");
                }
                if(!C.global.cheggBaseUrl){
                    C('global.cheggBaseUrl', "https://www.chegg.com/");
                }
                if(!C.global.cheggSiteSecureUrl){
                    C('global.cheggSiteSecureUrl', "https:"+"//www.chegg.com/");
                }
                if(!C.global.cheggSiteUrl){
                    C('global.cheggSiteUrl', "http:"+"//www.chegg.com/");
                }
                if(!C.global.liveSiteUrl){
                    C('global.liveSiteUrl', "https://www.chegg.com/");
                }
                if((!C.global.userEmail && "") ||
                    (!C.global.userFirstName && "") ||
                      (!C.global.userLastName && "") ||
                        (!C.global.userAvatar && "")){
                    C('global.userEmail', "");
                    C('global.userFirstName', "");
                    C('global.userLastName', "");
                    C('global.userAvatar', "");
                    C('global.loggedIn', "false" === "true");
                }
                //Prevent call to get user if we already have the information
                if(!C.global.csrfToken || (C.global.userEmail && C.global.loggedIn)){
                    C.utility.updateCsrfToken(ready, C.global.cheggSiteSecureUrl);
                }else{
                    ready();
                }
            }
        }

        function ready(){
            var activeExperiments = C.utility.getActiveExperiments();
            /** 
             *  CSP Onboarding phase 2 params
            */
            var CSPOnboardingPhase2Params = {};
            try{
                CSPOnboardingPhase2Params = JSON.parse('{"isCSPLiveOnboarding":false,"showStudyPackButton":false,"showPreOnBoarding":false,"showAutoMaticPreOnboarding":false,"showAutoMaticMegaMenu":false,"showMegaMenu":false,"preOnBoardingStep":null,"cspIterationFrequency":null,"isResponsiveSearch":true}');
            }catch(error){
                console.error('CHEGG HEADER: Error in JSON.parse for CSPOnboardingPhase2Params for payload: ', payload, 'where error is: ', error);
            };

            var structureMenuItems = '';
            var type = decodeURI('study');
            var userType = decodeURI('false');
            var searchProfile = decodeURI('federated-chegg-study-auto');
            var noConstellation = decodeURI('') === '1';
            var noSearch = decodeURI('false') === 'true';
            var searchOnScroll = decodeURI('') === 'hidden ';
            var userMenuItems = JSON.parse('{}');
            var settings = JSON.parse('{"globalNav":false,"hideDistractions":"","type":"study","userType":false,"subtype":"","year":2021,"renderDesktop":true,"renderMobile":true,"regSource":""}');
            var signInSignUpNoRedirect =  decodeURI('false') === 'true';
            var signOutNoRedirect = decodeURI('false') === 'true';
            var studyPackNavLink = decodeURI('true') === 'true';
            var hideOCSearch = decodeURI('false') === 'true';

            window.globalChggHeader = Eggshell.create('C.global.cheggheader')
                .trigger('set type', type)
                .trigger('set userType', userType)
                .trigger('set no search', noSearch)
                .trigger('set search on scroll', searchOnScroll)
                .trigger('disable constellation', noConstellation)
                .trigger('set search type', searchProfile)
                .trigger('set structure menu items', structureMenuItems)
                .trigger('set user menu items', userMenuItems)
                .trigger('set menu settings', settings)
                .trigger('set_sign_in_sign_up_no_redirect', signInSignUpNoRedirect)
                .trigger('set_sign_out_no_redirect', signOutNoRedirect)
                .trigger('set_csp_onboarding_phase2_params', CSPOnboardingPhase2Params)
                .trigger('set_study_pack_nav_link', studyPackNavLink)
                .trigger('set_hide_OC_search', hideOCSearch)
                .trigger('render');

            Eggshell.immuneToDestroyAll(window.globalChggHeader);
            oc.events.fire('globalHeaderCreated');
        }

    });
</script>

            //If OC search doesn't load this is a fallback redirect    
            function doSafetySearchRedirect() {
                var inputValue = document.getElementById('responsive-search-placeholder-input').value;
                window.location.href = '/search/'+encodeURIComponent(inputValue)+'/federated';
                return false;
            }
            </script>

    <div class="chg-footer"  >
            <oc-component href="//registry.chegg.com/chegg-footer/2.19.0?customCheggDomain=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chegg.com%2F&id=demo&data=%5Bobject%20Object%5D" data-hash="81701b9ba9e9e89bad9ff29b0f6f0b59a1b49c0c" data-name="chegg-footer" data-rendered="true" data-version="2.19.0"><script>
    window.oc = window.oc || {};
    oc.cmd = oc.cmd || [];
    oc.cmd.push( function ( oc ) {
        var isLoaded = false;
        var blockedLoading = false;
        var OCcallback = ready;
        var tutorC = null;

        // Versions of libs
        if ( window.jQuery && (jQuery.fn.jquery === '1.7.1') ) {
            window.cheggJQuery = jQuery;
        }
        if ( window._ && (_.VERSION === '1.4.3') ) {
            window.cheggUnderscore = _;
        }
        if ( window.Backbone && (Backbone.VERSION === '1.0.0') ) {
            window.cheggBackbone = Backbone;
        }

        var initComponent = function initComponent() {
            if ( !isLoaded
                    && !blockedLoading
                    && window.Eggshell
                    && window.cheggJQuery
                    && window.cheggUnderscore
                    && window.cheggBackbone
                    && window.C
                    && window.CheggFooter_Define ) {

                isLoaded = true;

                // Define component
                window.CheggFooter_Define(
                        window.cheggJQuery,
                        window.cheggJQuery,
                        window.cheggUnderscore,
                        window.cheggBackbone,
                        window.Eggshell
                );

                C.global = C.global || {};

                if ( !C.global.cheggBaseUrl ) {
                    C( 'global.cheggBaseUrl', "//www.chegg.com/" );
                }
                if ( !C.global.cheggSiteSecureUrl ) {
                    C( 'global.cheggSiteSecureUrl', "https:" + "//www.chegg.com/" );
                }
                //Prevent call to get user if we already have the information
                if ( !C.global.csrfToken && !!C.utility) {
                    C.utility.updateCsrfToken( OCcallback, C.global.cheggSiteSecureUrl );
                } else {
                    OCcallback();
                }
            }

        };

        function ready() {
            // Init components
            window.cheggJQuery( document ).ready( function () {
                var $el = window.cheggJQuery( '#demo.C-chegg-footer' );
                var component = Eggshell.create( 'C.chegg.footer', {
                    el: $el,
                    id: 'demo'
                } );
                oc.events.fire( 'CheggFooter_Init', {
                    id: 'demo',
                    component: component
                } );
            } );
        }

        // check if we've already loaded specific the OC
        function isComponentLoading( component ) {
            if ( typeof component == 'undefined' ) {
                component = 'chegg-header';
            }
            return !!oc.renderedComponents.hasOwnProperty( component );
        }

        // basically, this code we loaded only for labelUpdate, that why we check it here
        function isGlobalValueLoaded() {
            return typeof C !== 'undefined' && typeof C.global !== 'undefined' && typeof C.global.labelUpdate !== 'undefined';
        }

        // We need temporary to replace the global value 'C' on the tutors page and then return.
        function replaceBackCValue() {
            if ( tutorC ) {
                for ( var variable in tutorC.global ) {
                    C( 'global.' + variable, tutorC.global[ variable ] );
                }
            }
            ready();
        }
        // the value 'C' should be a function
        function replaceCValue() {
            if ( typeof C !== 'undefined' && typeof C !== 'function' ) {
                tutorC = Object.assign( {}, C );
                OCcallback = replaceBackCValue;
                delete( C );
            }
        }

        // the condition was added
        // for avoiding to load the same library 'global.lite.pack.js'
        // this library could be also loaded at the chegg-header component
        var globalPack;
        if ( !isGlobalValueLoaded() && isComponentLoading( 'chegg-header' ) === false ) {
            replaceCValue();
            globalPack = {
                url: "//components.cheggcdn.com/components/chegg-footer/2.19.0/dist/js/global.lite.pack.js",
                global: 'C'
            };
        } else {
            blockedLoading = true;
            oc.events.on('globalHeaderCreated', function () {
                blockedLoading = false;
                initComponent();
            });
        }

        var requiresList = [ {
            global: 'Eggshell',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/eggshell-minified.js'
        }, {
            global: 'cheggJQuery',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/jquery-1.7.1-ns.js'
        }, {
            global: 'cheggUnderscore',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/chegg-underscore-min.js'
        }, {
            global: 'cheggBackbone',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/chegg-backbone-min.js'
        } ];

        if ( !!globalPack ) {
            Array.prototype.push.apply( requiresList, [ globalPack ] );
        }
        Array.prototype.push.apply( requiresList, [ {
            global: 'CheggFooter_Define',
            url: "//components.cheggcdn.com/components/chegg-footer/2.19.0/dist/js/component.js"
        } ]);

        oc.requireSeries( requiresList, initComponent );

    } );

</script>

                <oc-component href="//registry.chegg.com/chegg-header/2.69.1?type=study&translucent=0&noDistractions=0&hideSearch=0&noSearch=0&searchOnScroll=0&searchProfile=federated-chegg-study-auto&registry=%2F%2Fregistry.chegg.com%2F&searchRendered=1&staticBaseUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chegg.com%2F&cheggBaseUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chegg.com%2F&nonSticky=0&forceDesktop=0&loadedOnChegg=1&hideMobileTutors=1&kitKatSearch=1&hybridKitKat=0&heroSmall=0&math=1&writing=1&studyPackNavLink=1&kitKatRelative=1&learnOnDedicatedNav=1&mobileOCSearch=1&mathSubjects=1&mathGraphing=1" data-hash="f17012c7b18fc51f1c17e7ecc040fc4fbc823d6b" data-name="chegg-header" data-rendered="true" data-version="2.69.1"><script>
    window.oc = window.oc || {};
    oc.cmd = oc.cmd || [];
    oc.cmd.push(function(oc){
        var oldUnderscore = window._;
        var oldBackbone = window.Backbone;
        var isLoaded = false;

        // Versions of libs
        if (window.jQuery && (jQuery.fn.jquery === '1.7.1')){
            window.cheggJQuery = jQuery;
        }
        if (window._ && (_.VERSION === '1.4.3')){
            window.cheggUnderscore = _;
        }
        if (window.Backbone && (Backbone.VERSION === '1.0.0')){
            window.cheggBackbone = Backbone;
        }

        var globalPack = {
            url: "//components.cheggcdn.com/components/chegg-header/2.69.1/dist/js/global.lite.pack.js"
        };
        if ( !!true ) {
            globalPack.global = 'C';
        }

        oc.requireSeries( [ {
            global: 'Eggshell',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/eggshell-minified.js'
        }, {
            global: 'cheggJQuery',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/jquery-1.7.1-ns.js'
        }, {
            global: 'cheggUnderscore',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/chegg-underscore-min.js'
        }, {
            global: 'cheggBackbone',
            url: '//assets.cheggcdn.com/libraries/chegg-backbone-min.js'
        }, globalPack, {
            global: 'Chegg_Header_Define',
            url: "//components.cheggcdn.com/components/chegg-header/2.69.1/dist/js/component.js"
        }], initComponent );


        function initComponent(){
            if (!isLoaded
                && window.Eggshell
                && window.cheggJQuery
                && window.cheggUnderscore
                && window.cheggBackbone
                && window.C
                && window.Chegg_Header_Define){

                isLoaded = true;
                // Define component
                window.Chegg_Header_Define(
                    window.cheggJQuery,
                    window.cheggJQuery,
                    window.cheggUnderscore,
                    window.cheggBackbone,
                    window.Eggshell
                );

                C.global = C.global || {};
                if(!C.global.coversBaseUrl){
                    C('global.coversBaseUrl', "//cs.cheggcdn.com/");
                }
                if(!C.global.tutorsCdnUrl){
                    C('global.tutorsCdnUrl', "//d3uhujs20ekyp2.cloudfront.net/tutors/");
                }
                if(!C.global.cheggBaseUrl){
                    C('global.cheggBaseUrl', "https://www.chegg.com/");
                }
                if(!C.global.cheggSiteSecureUrl){
                    C('global.cheggSiteSecureUrl', "https:"+"//www.chegg.com/");
                }
                if(!C.global.cheggSiteUrl){
                    C('global.cheggSiteUrl', "http:"+"//www.chegg.com/");
                }
                if(!C.global.liveSiteUrl){
                    C('global.liveSiteUrl', "https://www.chegg.com/");
                }
                if((!C.global.userEmail && "") ||
                    (!C.global.userFirstName && "") ||
                      (!C.global.userLastName && "") ||
                        (!C.global.userAvatar && "")){
                    C('global.userEmail', "");
                    C('global.userFirstName', "");
                    C('global.userLastName', "");
                    C('global.userAvatar', "");
                    C('global.loggedIn', "false" === "true");
                }
                //Prevent call to get user if we already have the information
                if(!C.global.csrfToken || (C.global.userEmail && C.global.loggedIn)){
                    C.utility.updateCsrfToken(ready, C.global.cheggSiteSecureUrl);
                }else{
                    ready();
                }
            }
        }

        function ready(){
            var activeExperiments = C.utility.getActiveExperiments();
            /** 
             *  CSP Onboarding phase 2 params
            */
            var CSPOnboardingPhase2Params = {};
            try{
                CSPOnboardingPhase2Params = JSON.parse('{"isCSPLiveOnboarding":false,"showStudyPackButton":false,"showPreOnBoarding":false,"showAutoMaticPreOnboarding":false,"showAutoMaticMegaMenu":false,"showMegaMenu":false,"preOnBoardingStep":null,"cspIterationFrequency":null,"isResponsiveSearch":true}');
            }catch(error){
                console.error('CHEGG HEADER: Error in JSON.parse for CSPOnboardingPhase2Params for payload: ', payload, 'where error is: ', error);
            };

            var structureMenuItems = '';
            var type = decodeURI('study');
            var userType = decodeURI('false');
            var searchProfile = decodeURI('federated-chegg-study-auto');
            var noConstellation = decodeURI('') === '1';
            var noSearch = decodeURI('false') === 'true';
            var searchOnScroll = decodeURI('') === 'hidden ';
            var userMenuItems = JSON.parse('{}');
            var settings = JSON.parse('{"globalNav":false,"hideDistractions":"","type":"study","userType":false,"subtype":"","year":2021,"renderDesktop":true,"renderMobile":true,"regSource":""}');
            var signInSignUpNoRedirect =  decodeURI('false') === 'true';
            var signOutNoRedirect = decodeURI('false') === 'true';
            var studyPackNavLink = decodeURI('true') === 'true';
            var hideOCSearch = decodeURI('false') === 'true';

            window.globalChggHeader = Eggshell.create('C.global.cheggheader')
                .trigger('set type', type)
                .trigger('set userType', userType)
                .trigger('set no search', noSearch)
                .trigger('set search on scroll', searchOnScroll)
                .trigger('disable constellation', noConstellation)
                .trigger('set search type', searchProfile)
                .trigger('set structure menu items', structureMenuItems)
                .trigger('set user menu items', userMenuItems)
                .trigger('set menu settings', settings)
                .trigger('set_sign_in_sign_up_no_redirect', signInSignUpNoRedirect)
                .trigger('set_sign_out_no_redirect', signOutNoRedirect)
                .trigger('set_csp_onboarding_phase2_params', CSPOnboardingPhase2Params)
                .trigger('set_study_pack_nav_link', studyPackNavLink)
                .trigger('set_hide_OC_search', hideOCSearch)
                .trigger('render');

            Eggshell.immuneToDestroyAll(window.globalChggHeader);
            oc.events.fire('globalHeaderCreated');
        }

    });
</script>

            //If OC search doesn't load this is a fallback redirect    
            function doSafetySearchRedirect() {
                var inputValue = document.getElementById('responsive-search-placeholder-input').value;
                window.location.href = '/search/'+encodeURIComponent(inputValue)+'/federated';
                return false;
            }
            </script>
            <form class="search-form-placeholder" onsubmit="return doSafetySearchRedirect();">
